availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Ausenbaugh Eison in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on December 28, 1839. Father of Francis M. Eison, Charlie Eison, Julia A. Eison, David Eison, Mary C. Eison, Nancy Eison, James Eison, Thomas Eison, Ann Eison, and Barbary Eison. Blacksmith in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 359B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 83-84.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 7.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644.
